Package suncertify.presentation.gui

Interface Summary
BookingGui This interface is to be implemented by the GUI class used in the view of the model viewer controller design pattern for the presentation tier of the Booking application.
BookingPanel This interface is to be implemented by any panel or dialog that is used in the GUI.
 

Class Summary
BookContractorDialog This dialog is used for performing the operation of booking a contractor using a customer number to mark the record as booked.
BookingConfigurationDialog This class extends JDialog and is opened when the application is opened with either "alone" or when no command line argument (flag) is used and uses the sheared ConfigurationPanel and then closed once the configuration parameters are set.
BookingConfigurationPanel This class extends JPanel and is a sheared panel used to configure the application depending on which mode it has been started.
BookingControlPanel This class is used to preform operations on a record that has already been selected in the display table using it's various buttons.

It implements the BookingPanel interface so it can be added to the a BookingGui.
BookingDisplayPanel This class extends JPanel is used to display searched records in a JTable.

It implements the BookingPanel interface so it can be added to the a BookingGui.
BookingDisplayTableModel The contractor records display table model used by the SearchedRecordsDisplayPanel instance to populate the display table.
BookingGuiImp This class extends JFrame and implements BookingGui so the GUI class can be used in the view of the model viewer controller design pattern for the presentation tier of the Booking application.
BookingSearchPanel This class is used to preform search operations on the database.
BookingServerGui This class extends JFrame and is used to frame the BookingConfigurationPanel on the server mode creating the GUI to control the server.
DataFileFilter This class extends the javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter and is used by the ConfigurationPanel file chooser.
